summary: Life for an isolated rural family is upended when a major highway next to their property, constructed 10 years before but apparently abandoned, is finally opened.
cast: Isabelle Huppert|Olivier Gourmet|Adélaïde Leroux|Madeleine Budd|Kacey Mottet Klein|Renaud Rivier|Kilian Torrent|Nicolas Del Sordo|Hugo Saint-James|Virgil Berset|Ivaylo Ivanov|Jean-François Stévenin|David Collin|Valdimir Sartori|Stéphane Gabioud|Marc Berman
title: Home ¿Dulce hogar?
